General.Name: KraussMaffei Co Ltd
General.Description: KraussMaffei Company Limited engages in the provision of plastics and rubber production and processing machinery and systems. It offers injection molding machinery, extrusion technology, reaction process machinery, digital services solutions, and industry and technology solutions. The company was formerly known as Qingdao Tianhua Institute Of Chemistry Engineering Company Limited. and changed its name to KraussMaffei Company Limited in September 2019. KraussMaffei Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China. KraussMaffei Company Limited is a subsidiary of China National Chemical Corporation.
General.Address: No. 3 Jinling Industrial Park, Qingdao, China, 266111
